Welcome to Alba Public School On behalf of the Board of Education, the faculty and staff let me welcome you to the 2018-19 school year. We extend a warm welcome to the students, parents and community! We are a small school big on kids. We are all eager for the school year to begin and look forward to seeing the kids and parents soon. If you have any questions regarding the school please do not hesitate to call the office. Thank you for your ongoing support for Alba Public School. Let’s have a great school year. Go Wildcats!!
